document.heading: Fire and Casualty Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-18, the “Fire and Casualty Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-31. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 7, 2013, and June 4, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 27, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-95 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-18 became effective on September 19, 2013.
